page.topic: How to Convert a Freeform Report to a Layout Table Report
page.description: A Freeform Report can be converted to a Layout Table Report.

discussion.p: There are some operations in Alpha Anywhere that can only be performed on Layout Table Reports. For example, exporting a Report definition to Excel, Word, HTML, or Ascii formats is only supported for Layout Table Reports. If you want to be able to perform the same action on a Freeform Report, the Freeform Report must be converted to a Layout Table Report.

Reports can be defined in one of two locations: in the Control Panel or the Web Projects Control Panel. The sections below explain how to convert a Freeform Report to a Layout Table Report for reports saved in both of these locations.

section.title: Converting a Freeform Report to a Layout Table Report on the Control Panel

step.description: Navigate to the Control Panel and select the *[ui:Reports]* tab to display the reports in the project.
Right-click on the Freeform Report and select "Convert Free-Form to Layout Table Report".
Give the report a unique name and click *[ui:OK]*.

section.title: Converting a Freeform Report to a Layout Table Report on the Web Projects Control Panel

step.description: Navigate to the Web Projects Control Panel and click on *[ui:[report]Reports (Project)]* in the left-hand column to show the reports in the web project.
Right-click on the Freeform Report and select "Convert Free-Form to Layout Table Report".
step.note: If "Convert Free-Form to Layout Table Report" is not an option, make sure you have selected the *[ui:[report]Reports (Project)]* option in the left hand column. "Convert Free-Form to Layout Table Report" will only be available if the Web Project Control Panel has been configured to only display Reports in the web project.

step.description: Give the report a unique name and click *[ui:OK]*.
